text: Dr Henry Loh is a fabulous physician with excellent bedside manner.  A thoughtful, detailed and caring doctor, he is a keeper. The clinic in Parkway Parade has a wonderful front of staff, making checking in a pleasant and swift experience.

Dr Henry Loh is warm and friendly, very detailed in explaining my conditions, ensuring i am feeling at my best throughout the whole IPL process, thank you for the great care. And also, clinic nurse Jade assisted in my treatment procedure in a very gentle way as well. Thank you DAS for the very pleasant experience.

Experience from making an appointment till consultation did not made me felt that my problem was resolved nor listen to. I wasn’t even treated nor my complain was heard with the doctor.

Counter staff wasn’t professional too, the registration felt like a transaction rather than being welcomed like a concerned patient. Never step in again!

Today I came to see Dr. Henry Loh for my first acne treatment. I was impressed with the service of Dr. Henry and his staff. He is patient in explaining to me my acne problem and also the treatment I should receive. I highly recommend anyone who has facial skin problem to consult him.

Dr Henry Loh is very caring and patient with my recent visit to his clinic. This is my first time to this clinic and I highly recommend him to other patients. Feeling much better after one week of taking the antibiotics and ointment for my face, caused by an inexperienced beautician who did the facial for me. Thank you Dr Henry Loh.
